cn.sliew.milky.thread

接口 RunnableWrapper

  • 所有超级接口:
    Runnable

    public interface RunnableWrapper
extends Runnable

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 默认方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void doRun()
      This method has the same semantics as Runnable.run()
      default boolean isForceExecution()
      Should the runnable force its execution in case it gets rejected?
      default void onAfter()
      This method is called in a finally block after successful execution or on a rejection.
      void onFailure(Exception e)
      This method is invoked for all exception thrown by doRun()
      default void onRejection(Exception e)
      This should be executed if the thread-pool executing this action rejected the execution.
      default void run() 

    • 方法详细资料

      • run

        default void run()
        指定者:
        run 在接口中 Runnable

      • doRun

        void doRun()
    throws Exception
        This method has the same semantics as Runnable.run()
        抛出:
        InterruptedException - if the run method throws an InterruptedException
        Exception

      • onAfter

        default void onAfter()
        This method is called in a finally block after successful execution or on a rejection.
        另请参阅:
        MilkyThreadPoolExecutor.execute(java.lang.Runnable)

      • onFailure

        void onFailure(Exception e)
        This method is invoked for all exception thrown by doRun()

      • onRejection

        default void onRejection(Exception e)
        This should be executed if the thread-pool executing this action rejected the execution. The default implementation forwards to onFailure(Exception)
        另请参阅:
        MilkyThreadPoolExecutor.execute(java.lang.Runnable)

      • isForceExecution

        default boolean isForceExecution()
        Should the runnable force its execution in case it gets rejected?
